nodes.text: Tomb of Vaius Antinus was the resting place of Vaius Antinus, a Sith record-keeper who lived circa 5000 BBY. Following his passing, Antinus was buried on the Core World of Alderaan, a fact that was well known to later archeologists. In 3642 BBY the tomb was visited by archaeologist Auselio Gann and later by his protege Talos Drellik.
The Tomb of Vaius Antinus is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during Talos Drellik companion storyline.
